GK19kragh_iu:6450: svāṃ daśāṃ ca viṣasāda pārthivaḥ Ragh_11.67d
GK19kragh_iu:6464: hanmi lokam uta te makhārjitam Ragh_11.84d
GK19kragh_iu:6465: haratā tvāṃ vada kiṃ na me hṛtam Ragh_8.67d
GK19kragh_iu:6469: harir iva yugadīrghair dorbhir aṃṣais tadīyaiḥ Ragh_10.87c
GK19kragh_iu:6474: hariṃ viditvā haribhiś ca vājibhiḥ Ragh_3.43b
GK19kragh_iu:6496: hā tāteti kranditam ākarṇya viṣaṇṇas Ragh_9.75a
GK19kragh_iu:6497: hāsyaṃ vacas tad yad ahaṃ vivakṣuḥ Ragh_2.43b
GK19kragh_iu:6521: hṛdayaṃ na tv avalambituṃ kṣamāḥ Ragh_8.60d
GK19kragh_iu:6523: hṛdaye kiṃ nihitā na hanti mām Ragh_8.46b
GK19kragh_iu:6526: hṛdi kṣato gotrabhid apy amarṣaṇaḥ Ragh_3.53b
GK19kragh_iu:6530: hṛṣṭāpi sā hrīvijitā na sākṣād Ragh_7.69a
